snippet: Renee-Nicole Douceur, a worker at the isolated Amundsen-Scott research station at the South Pole, has been awaiting a rescue plane since she suffered a stroke on Aug. 27.
lead_paragraph: Renee-Nicole Douceur, a worker at the isolated Amundsen-Scott research station at the South Pole, has been awaiting a rescue plane since she suffered a stroke on Aug. 27.

headline.main: Worker at South Pole Station Pushes for a Rescue After a Stroke
headline.print_headline: Worker at South Pole Station Pushes for a Rescue After a Stroke
headline.seo: South Pole Worker Stranded After Stroke
